CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Standard Dine-in relative to Large Group Booking?
SRP.A: Standard Dine-in is {above} Large Group Booking in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total average order value?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Large Group Booking}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total average order value?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Standard Dine-in}.

VE.Q: What is Seasonal Special Order's Average Order Value in 1975?
VE.A: Seasonal Special Order's average order value in 1975 is {60.45} $.

VE.Q: What is Seasonal Special Order's Average Order Value in 1970?
VE.A: Seasonal Special Order's average order value in 1970 is {49.41} $.

VE.Q: What is Seasonal Special Order's Average Order Value in 1974?
VE.A: Seasonal Special Order's average order value in 1974 is {59.98} $.

VE.Q: What are the average order value of Standard Dine-in, Seasonal Special Order, and Large Group Booking in 1970?
VE.A: Standard Dine-in's average order value is {13.19} $, Seasonal Special Order's average order value is {49.41} $, Large Group Booking's average order value is {49.93} $.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Average Order Value in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum average order value is {0.87} $.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Average Order Value in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum average order value is {95.46} $.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Average Order Value level recorded for Breakfast Rush Order?
EVJ.A: Breakfast Rush Order reached approximately {70.90} $ in {1989}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Average Order Value level recorded for Breakfast Rush Order?
EVJ.A: Breakfast Rush Order's lowest recorded level is approximately {29.78} $ in {1962}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Average Order Value?
SC.A: The average total average order value is {185.34} $.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Average Order Value exceed 211.33 $? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Average Order Value go below 155.19 $? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Average Order Value fall between 174.10 and 192.43 $? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1968 and 1976, did the total Average Order Value experience a larger or smaller change than between 1981 and 1985?
NC.A: The change in total average order value between 1968 and 1976 was {larger} than between 1981 and 1985.

NC.Q: Was the total Average Order Value in 1962 higher or lower than in 1984?
NC.A: The total average order value in 1962 was {lower} than in 1984.

NC.Q: Between 1965 and 1986, was the average total Average Order Value higher or lower than between 1962 and 1979?
NC.A: The average total average order value between 1965 and 1986 was {higher} than between 1962 and 1979.

NC.Q: Between 1977 and 1983, was the average total Average Order Value higher or lower than between 1980 and 1988?
NC.A: The average total average order value between 1977 and 1983 was {lower} than between 1980 and 1988.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Large Group Booking} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Standard Dine-in, Breakfast Rush Order, Large Group Booking, Seasonal Special Order}.
